meanings.definition: A toothed wheel that engages with another toothed wheel to transmit motion.
meanings.sent1: The cogwheels in the clock turned smoothly together.
meanings.sent2: The engineer designed the machine with precise cogwheels.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome replaced the cogwheels in the clock with candy wheels.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the cogwheels of fate were turning slowly but surely.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cogwheels clicking was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: A mechanical device consisting of toothed wheels working together.
meanings.sent1: The old factory relied on cogwheels to power its machines.
meanings.sent2: The intricate clock tower was filled with cogwheels of all sizes.
meanings.sent3: The inventor created a silly hat with spinning cogwheels on top.
meanings.sent4: The cogwheels of progress never stop turning in the city.
meanings.sent5: The cogwheels meshed perfectly, creating a symphony of movement.
